value:
$WmMPID_総選挙エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_ELECTION01,Face|We gather here, guardians of
the brave, to fight our last battle.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙アルム,ch10_00_Arum_M_ELECTION01,Face|For those who called me here, I
cannot lose!$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_ELECTION01,Face|It won't do to embarrass ourselves
on the battlefield!$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_ELECTION01,Face|Heroes from different worlds, joining
together as comrades in arms... Yune
might just smile if she could see this.$k$pAnd now...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_総選挙ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_ELECTION01,Face|You have demonstrated your
strength.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙アルム,ch10_00_Arum_M_ELECTION01,Face|And it has been shown to be
formidable enough to subdue us.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_ELECTION01,Face|Does that mean we can go now?$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_ELECTION01,Face|I see. The name of the legendary
summoner carved into the stone
of this temple...$k$pIt's you, $Nu...$k$pYou remind me of a traveling tactician
I knew long ago, you know.$k$pI am told you are not just a tactician,
but one who binds together people
from across the realms...$k$pIf we have been called here, perhaps
we are meant to join forces with the
many Heroes already gathered...$k$pIf that is the case, I eagerly await such
an opportunity. Until that time comes,
farewell, $Nu...$k$p$Sbs150|
